titles.title: Good Neighbor Authority Improvement Act
Good Neighbor Authority Improvement Act
A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to clarify forest, rangeland, and watershed restoration services under good neighbor agreements.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Good Neighbor Authority Improvement Act
This bill amends the Agricultural Act of 2014 to permit the Department of Agriculture to carry out as forest, rangeland, and watershed restoration services under a good neighbor agreement the reconstruction, repair, or restoration of a National Forest System road that is necessary to carry out the authorized restoration services.
